permissions: User must be an admin or a broker manager for the lineup scenario broker; access is scoped to lineup scenarios belonging to brokers the user is a member of.
side_effects: Creates a lineup scenario solution and enqueues an async solver job. The solution starts unsolved until the solver finishes and updates status, assignments, cost, and solved_at.
validation_notes: --lineup-scenario is required and must be non-empty. A lineup_scenario relationship is required when creating a lineup scenario solution.
